name: Fair's Treasures and Trinkets
description: A stone cabinet found in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, often used by vendors to showcase their wares. Its most distinctive feature is its dedicated fabric display area, where accessories of all shapes and sizes can be suspended against a white backing cloth â€” not only an efficient method of storage, but also a way to set off their fine craftsmanship, thus stimulating the customer's desire to purchase them. The owner of Mol Stone House, for one, clearly approves of this design...
